n: Christian's Killer BBQ and Grill Marinade
des: "This marinade has developed over some time. Now it's perfect. If I change something it's not as good. It's perfect on all meats, and gives that wonderful taste you get sometimes when served professionally prepared grilled and BBQ'ed food. With this one it's 'always' though! This marinade stores well."
ins:
Place oil, vinegar, Worcestershire sauce, soy sauce, honey, molasses, whiskey, seasoning salt, salt-free seasoning blend, garlic powder, ginger, browning sauce, mustard, and liquid smoke in a resealable container or bottle, and shake well. Store marinade in refrigerator until ready to use.
Bring marinade to room temperature and shake well before each use.
